Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| photoconversion efficiency |

Explanation:

1. Photoconversion efficiency: This is a material property, as it refers to the ability of a material to convert light into electrical energy.
2. Monochromatic EQE values: This is also a material property, as it refers to the external quantum efficiency of a material under monochromatic light.

The other entity, "wavelength range of 300-700 nm," is not a material property, but rather a range of wavelengths over which the material's properties are being measured.
